Name: Sergeant SerpentScreen
Description: A legendary figure in the WebtrES club, Sergeant SerpentScreen is known for his unyielding discipline and strategic prowess. His classic box-shaped body is a testament to his old-school values, while his soldier buttons hint at his military background. Despite a rigid exterior, his arms are always positioned down, signifying a readiness to reach out to his teammates. The snake on his screen is not just for show; it represents his ability to adapt and strike with precision in the digital realm. Stories of his exploits have slithered through the circuits of the club, inspiring both respect and a touch of fear among his pixelated peers.
